title: The Weekly Free Rotation not Updating/Working
body: I look on the League of Legends website and I see the new Weekly rotation. In my head I was like cool I was always wanted to try out Oriana, but whenever I go in game I see Oriana locked. Even when I go to legacy client it shows the old champions from last week rotation plz tell me whats going on{{champion:61}} {{champion:61}} {{item:3110}}

replies.body: Based on the [rotation](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/free-rotation/extra-free-supports-continues-new-free-rotation-0), Orianna should be free for the week and should be available now.  If you're on the updated client it does show as a lock icon but it looks kind of tiny and meant to be unlocked.  :P  Hope that helps!

Same here idk why My champion rotation thing diden't update either :/{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
